title: Indigenous Youth Leadership Programme Scholars : Digital storytelling workshop
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
abstract: Seven stories produced by students from the Foundation of Young Australians as part of Digital Storytelling
description: Seven digital stories from young Indigenous people about their upbringing, lives, family, friends, their hopes for the future and what it is like to grow up as an Indigenous Australian.
